abstract.p: Correction to April 14 picture caption about temporary eviction of Iraqi civilians by US Marines in Anbar Province concerns unit that commandeered home of two boys shown in photo

block.p: A picture caption on Wednesday about the temporary eviction of Iraqi civilians by the United States Marines as they fight insurgents in Iraq's Anbar Province misidentified the unit that commandeered the home of the two boys shown in the photograph. It is the Second Battalion, Seventh Marine regiment -- not the Second Battalion, Seventh Division. A correction in this space yesterday referred incorrectly in some copies to the structure of the Marine Corps. It does indeed have divisions. (They are the First, Second, Third and Fourth.)
